H0.text: Kinetic energy into electric energy is the energy transformation from the turning turbine to electricity in a hydroelectric plant where moving water turns a turbine.

H1.text: Nuclear energy into electric energy is the energy transformation that describes how moving water turns a turbine to produce electricity in a hydroelectric plant.

H2.text: Thermal energy into electric energy is the energy transformation that occurs when moving water turns a turbine in a hydroelectric plant to produce electricity.

H3.text: Chemical energy into electric energy is the transformation that occurs from the turning turbine to electricity in a hydroelectric plant when moving water turns a turbine.
